attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a Petiton that will hopefully get across the point,to the fact that we are fighting a war that is unwinable. soldiers are daying day in day out for what reason? i dont think the prime minister even knows the real reason what we are doing there? enough is enough its time to pull the troops out. so please sign this petition to help.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
